meta.title: Yandex, all seo tools in one place on Foudroyer
meta.description: Yandex Webmaster Tool's interface isn't very pleasant, so we've created Foudroyer, to centralize and create the tools you need.

label.value: All Yandex seo tools in one place

title.value: Index and track your statistics with our seo tool for Yandex

content.description: Don't waste any more time going to Yandex Webmaster Tool, use Foudroyer and centralize all your data in a single tool. Keywords, visits, clicks, from Bing, Yandex and Google.

title.value: I was tired of going to the Yandex Webmaster Tool, which is why I created Foudroyer.

content.value:
I love creating international sites, in a dozen languages. The aim is to reach as many people as possible, and to achieve this, I add all my sites to Yandex, Bing and Google. However, to keep track of my search engine performance, I have to juggle between the Yandex Webmaster Tool, Bing Webmaster and Google Search Console.

What a hell! And that's when I asked myself, is it possible to centralize everything?

content.description: Foudroyer Analytics drastically improves the understanding of your site's traffic, allowing you to take action at the right time and surge in search engine results.

title.value: Google, Bing, Yandex, increase your traffic

features.description: Being indexed on multiple search engines can radically increase your traffic. We make that easy for you.
Finally understand the traffic on your sites and easily identify sudden changes that are hard to spot.
Comparison is key to learn what your users look for. It's natively integrated in our interface.
Wave goodbye to complicated dates filters. Navigate easily through time.

content.description: It has never been easier to follow your keywords thanks to Foudroyer!

title.value: The exact position of your keywords.

features.description: Directly connected to search engines, Foudroyer gives you exact and precise positions.

video.alt: Video illustrating the "Follow exact position" feature

features.description: One or more words to add? Do it in just 4 seconds flat.

video.alt: Video describing how to add keywords with the Keywords tool

features.description: Click on a word and discover its detailed results that you won't be able to do without.

video.alt: Video describing how to trigger the keywords detailed view

label.value: Index at the speed of light

content.description: Foudroyer Indexation is a tool that allows you to index your website on search engines in a few seconds. Simply add your website, click and boom, your website is indexed.

features.description: Added or updated a page? Click on the button and your website is indexed.
Indexing at the same time on Google, Bing, Yandex and Naver as never been so easy.
We automatically parse your sitemap and index all your pages in a blink of an eye.
